titles.title: To enhance the competitiveness of the nuclear sector of the United States in foreign countries, and for other purposes.
To enhance the competitiveness of the nuclear sector of the United States in foreign countries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, Energy and Commerce, Financial Services, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
